messages.subject: Re: Added another 4 photos of the 2 Tsubas...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, Someone asked if I could put up a closer up shot of each of the Tsubas, so I have 1st Tsuba Front side and Reverse side and 2nd Tsuba Front side and
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
Someone asked if I could put up a closer up shot of each of the Tsubas, so I have 1st Tsuba Front
side and Reverse side and 2nd Tsuba Front side and Reverse side. I can't tell if they are Brass
or Bronze.

Kim
